OOC: She's lock down, take in count that.

Nightlight::

Nightlight vaguely heard someone around but in corritor, she started 
struck the quarter's door, hoping that whoever was outside was a 
friend. 


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     He let the dragon leave.  After he was gone, Aerotaur flew down 
and into 
> the ship.  He had heard Termitron say that the queen is dead.  He 
knew that 
> meant Nightlight.  But how?  He had locked up Gramps.  He wandered 
through 
> the base and found Gramps' body.  He opened the first door nearby.
